content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Shattered Hand Normal damage. Until healed, the target is clumsy 2 and enfeebled 2, and it can't use one of its hands (chosen randomly by the GM). Bludgeoning
Right in the Ear Normal damage. The target is deafened until healed. Piercing
Stand Aside Push the target 5 feet. Slashing
Vampiric Feedback Normal damage. You regain Hit Points equal half the damage you dealt. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #14
